students_schemes.name: National Scholarship Program
students_schemes.criteria: Meritorious students with family income below ₹2 Lakh
students_schemes.description: Provides financial aid for higher education to deserving students.

students_schemes.name: Education Loan Subsidy Scheme
students_schemes.criteria: Students availing educational loans for professional courses
students_schemes.description: Interest subsidy on education loans for economically weaker sections.

students_schemes.name: Tech Talent Scholarship
students_schemes.criteria: Engineering students with excellent academic records
students_schemes.description: Offered by private firms to promote tech talent.

students_schemes.name: Post Matric Scholarship
students_schemes.criteria: Students in higher secondary education from low-income backgrounds
students_schemes.description: Scholarship for students in high school or undergraduate studies.

students_schemes.name: Young Scientist Fellowship Scheme
students_schemes.criteria: Students pursuing research in science and technology
students_schemes.description: Fellowship for students in science, engineering, and innovation fields.

students_schemes.name: AICTE Pragati Scholarship for Girls
students_schemes.description: Financial aid for women enrolled in technical courses.

students_schemes.name: Merit-cum-Means Scholarship
students_schemes.criteria: Students from minority communities pursuing professional courses
students_schemes.description: Scholarship covering tuition fees and maintenance allowance.

students_schemes.name: Global Education Scholarship
students_schemes.description: Funding support for students planning to study internationally.

students_schemes.name: Skill Development Initiative
students_schemes.criteria: Students undergoing vocational or skill-based training
students_schemes.description: Provides skill training to enhance employability.

students_schemes.name: Startup India Seed Fund
students_schemes.description: Seed funding for young entrepreneurs to start their ventures.

farmers_schemes.name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC) Scheme
farmers_schemes.criteria: Farmers requiring credit for agricultural activities
farmers_schemes.description: Short-term credit facility for farmers at low interest rates.

farmers_schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
farmers_schemes.criteria: Farmers facing crop damage due to natural calamities
farmers_schemes.description: Crop insurance scheme covering damages due to natural disasters.

farmers_schemes.name: Soil Health Card Scheme
farmers_schemes.criteria: Farmers interested in improving soil fertility
farmers_schemes.description: Provides a soil health report to help improve crop productivity.

farmers_schemes.name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana
farmers_schemes.criteria: Farmers seeking financial support for new agricultural projects
farmers_schemes.description: Grants for agricultural development projects to improve productivity.

farmers_schemes.name: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture
farmers_schemes.description: Encourages water-efficient and climate-resilient agricultural techniques.

farmers_schemes.name: Agri-Business Incubation Program
farmers_schemes.description: Financial aid and training for agripreneurs.

farmers_schemes.name: Organic Farming Support Scheme
farmers_schemes.description: Subsidies for organic farming equipment and fertilizers.

farmers_schemes.name: Dairy Entrepreneurship Development Scheme
farmers_schemes.description: Financial support for setting up dairy farms and processing units.

farmers_schemes.name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana
farmers_schemes.criteria: Farmers interested in organic and natural farming
farmers_schemes.description: Promotes organic farming and provides training and subsidies.

womens_schemes.name: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao
womens_schemes.criteria: Girl children under the age of 10
womens_schemes.description: Promotes education and welfare of girl children.

womens_schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana
womens_schemes.description: Financial aid for maternity expenses and nutrition.

womens_schemes.name: Working Women Hostel Scheme
womens_schemes.criteria: Employed women needing safe and affordable accommodation
womens_schemes.description: Provides subsidized housing for working women.

womens_schemes.name: Udyogini Scheme
womens_schemes.description: Provides loans to women for starting small businesses.

womens_schemes.name: MUDRA Yojana for Women
womens_schemes.criteria: Women wanting to start small businesses
womens_schemes.description: Provides collateral-free business loans to women entrepreneurs.

womens_schemes.name: Women Startup Program
womens_schemes.description: Incubation program to support female-led startups.

womens_schemes.name: Self Employment Loan for Women
womens_schemes.criteria: Women looking for financial assistance for self-employment
womens_schemes.description: Provides easy-access loans for self-employed women.

womens_schemes.name: Digital Literacy Program for Women
womens_schemes.description: Free training in digital literacy and online safety.

womens_schemes.name: Mahila Kisan Sashaktikaran Pariyojana
womens_schemes.description: Empowers women farmers through training and financial aid.

girls_schemes.name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
girls_schemes.criteria: Parents of girl children below 10 years
girls_schemes.description: Savings scheme with high interest for the future of girl children.

girls_schemes.name: CBSE Udaan Scheme
girls_schemes.criteria: Girls studying in class 11 and 12 in CBSE schools
girls_schemes.description: Provides free coaching and study materials for engineering entrance exams.

girls_schemes.name: National Scheme of Incentive to Girls for Secondary Education
girls_schemes.criteria: SC/ST girls who have passed class 8
girls_schemes.description: Provides financial assistance for girls continuing secondary education.

girls_schemes.name: Dhanalakshmi Scheme
girls_schemes.description: Cash incentives for birth, education, and vaccination of girl children.

girls_schemes.name: Kanya Shiksha Pravesh Utsav
girls_schemes.criteria: Girls who dropped out of school
girls_schemes.description: Encourages and supports the return of girls to school.

girls_schemes.name: Balika Samridhi Yojana
girls_schemes.criteria: Girl children born in economically weaker families
girls_schemes.description: Provides financial support for the education of girls from low-income families.

girls_schemes.name: Kishori Shakti Yojana
girls_schemes.description: Improves nutrition, health, and overall development of adolescent girls.

girls_schemes.name: Ladli Laxmi Yojana
girls_schemes.criteria: Girl children born in Madhya Pradesh
girls_schemes.description: Provides financial support for education and marriage of girl children.

girls_schemes.name: NANHI KALI
girls_schemes.description: Supports education for underprivileged girl children.

girls_schemes.name: STEM Scholarship for Girls
girls_schemes.criteria: Girls pursuing science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM) education
girls_schemes.description: Provides financial aid for female students in STEM fields.

boys_schemes.name: National Means-Cum-Merit Scholarship
boys_schemes.criteria: Students from Class 9 to 12 with a family income below ₹1.5 lakh per annum
boys_schemes.description: Provides scholarships to meritorious students from economically weaker sections.

boys_schemes.name: Pragati Scholarship for Boys
boys_schemes.criteria: Male students pursuing technical education in AICTE-approved institutions
boys_schemes.description: Scholarship for boys to support technical and engineering education.

boys_schemes.name: Inspire Scholarship
boys_schemes.criteria: Students who scored top 1% in 12th board exams and pursuing science courses
boys_schemes.description: Scholarship to promote scientific research and innovation.

boys_schemes.name: PM CARES for Children Scheme
boys_schemes.criteria: Children who lost both parents due to COVID-19
boys_schemes.description: Provides financial and educational support to children orphaned during the pandemic.

boys_schemes.name: Eklavya Model Residential School
boys_schemes.description: Provides free residential education for ST students.

boys_schemes.name: Vidyalakshmi Education Loan Scheme
boys_schemes.criteria: Students pursuing higher education in India and abroad
boys_schemes.description: Provides financial assistance for students through education loans.

boys_schemes.name: Bal Shakti Puraskar
boys_schemes.criteria: Students under 18 who have excelled in education, innovation, or social service
boys_schemes.description: Awards children for exceptional achievements in various fields.

boys_schemes.name: KVPY (Kishore Vaigyanik Protsahan Yojana)
boys_schemes.criteria: Students interested in research in science
boys_schemes.description: Provides fellowships to students interested in research careers.

boys_schemes.name: AIIMS Free Medical Coaching
boys_schemes.criteria: Students preparing for NEET from economically weaker sections
boys_schemes.description: Provides free coaching for medical entrance exams.

boys_schemes.name: Sports Authority of India (SAI) Scholarship
boys_schemes.criteria: Students excelling in sports at national and state levels
boys_schemes.description: Provides scholarships and training to talented sports students.
